entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
